characterInfo.Appears in: Words of Radiance,  Oathbringer (mentioned)  Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Jaxlim, Eshonai's and Venli's mother, chose to live in a shack on the very edge of Narak, almost fully exposed to the storms. She worked her shalebark rows outside her home. In continuing to wear workform, even after the discovery of nimbleform, she said that she didn't want to encourage people to see one form as more valuable than another, that such stratification could destroy them.
She has been described as suffering from dementia. Eshonai believes she's no longer fully alive, yet Jaxlim understands that Venli will need a storm for her transformation.
